entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `payload` TEXT NOT NULL, `label` TEXT, `field_source` TEXT, `field_note` TEXT, `captured_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_qr_records_payload

indices.name: index_qr_records_captured_at
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_qr_records_captured_at` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`captured_at`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT NOT NULL, `batch_no` TEXT, `brand_trademark` TEXT, `model` TEXT, `type` TEXT, `rating` TEXT, `size` TEXT, `image_path` TEXT, `gallery_paths` TEXT, `linked_serial` TEXT, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_verified` INTEGER NOT NULL, `needs_sync` INTEGER NOT NULL, `server_id` TEXT, `last_synced` INTEGER)

indices.name: index_sku_records_barcode
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sku_records_barcode` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`barcode`)

indices.name: index_sku_records_is_verified

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT NOT NULL, `uri` TEXT NOT NULL, `file_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `field_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ocr_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `record_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)
